name: Kick Ass Commandos
description: Lock and Load! It's time to Kick Ass. Grab your machine-gun, flamethrower, rocket launcher and grenades. Assault the enemy base and free commandos to join your team while you destroy everything in sight. Make your way through enemy bunkers to rescue your comrades, and kill everyone else you encounter!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 etc Процессор: 1.2Ghz+ Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 256 MB+ DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 250 MB Дополнительно: Supports Gamepad

reviews.review_text: An awesome game reminiscent of Contra and Ikari Warriors!

I give this game 9/10 for the following reasons:  -takes you back to the 1980's SEGA game Rambo among others -fun even if you aren't over 25 -addictive and hard to put down -you can upgrade commandos with points for extra firepower, HP, fireing rate etc -soundtrack is so right...right of of an arcade -it's pretty funny too -it's cheap -no negatives I can think of  Buy it and have fun!!!
lol if it looks fun it is lots of lvls and its vary hard

Ever play True Lies on Super Nintendo?  This game plays like that only with Some Kickass music and characters you might recognize from movies!(or there Likeness anyways) I had a blast playing this game! This game also has a characters to choose from and the levels are quite fun!
This game is dope! Highly Recommended!!
I don't normally review games, let alone indie games, so I'll keep this short and say that this is the most heart-pounding helluva good shoot 'em up I've played in a long time.
Solid gameplay with quite a bit of content including replayability. The only thing that I wish the game had was coop multiplayer to game with friends. Other than that solid work and great title.
